results.title: Add telemetry.enterprise.githubcopilot.com to copilot engine default allowlist
results.author: Copilot
results.impact_rationale: Adds telemetry domain to copilot engine default allowlist. Enables enterprise telemetry without manual configuration. Medium impact - helpful but not critical.
results.urgency_rationale: Very recent PR (< 1 hour old). Improves telemetry access but not blocking. Low urgency.
results.quality_rationale: Draft status, CI pending. Good description. 100 files changed (recompiled workflows). Needs CI validation.
results.action_explanation: Draft PR with low urgency. Defer until marked ready and CI passes. Small code change but large recompile footprint.

results.title: Fix firewall SSL-bump field extraction in frontmatter parser
results.author: Copilot
results.impact_rationale: Fixes critical bug blocking documented firewall HTTPS inspection feature. Users cannot configure ssl-bump or allow-urls. High impact - blocks feature usage.
results.urgency_rationale: Fixes issue #13908. Blocks documented feature. Age: 11.0 hours. Already triaged. High priority from schema analysis.
results.quality_rationale: Excellent description with examples. 8 unit tests + integration test. Not draft but CI pending. Already has triage labels. Fixes known issue.
results.action_explanation: Critical bug fix for documented feature. Well-tested, fixes known issue. Fast-track once CI passes despite medium risk (security-related changes).
